title: Baron Von Veigar?
body: Can I pretty, pretty please buy the Baron Von Veigar skin? I noticed it a little while ago and I have to have it, it goes perfectly with my name. Why is it even there still if it's unavailable? Will it be available again, or was just left there to tease people with?

replies.body: Its actually a really neat skin, but then again its Legacy so you'll have to wait it out...it ain't gonna be locked forever
